name: Businessman 3D Single Player
description:
Step-by-step economic strategy in a circular field. Move around the game world in your own car with a third person view. Build any enterprises on any free area, fill the streets with houses. Monopoly is not needed, do honest business with your competitors. In addition to companies, you can also buy and sell stocks and goods, take a bank loan, rent an office, sue other players and, if desired, work on the black market.

Calculations of income and expenses are made only in the Tax Inspectorate at every crossing of the Start field. The economic model of the game is significantly expanded. The winner is the businessman who best invests his start-up capital in the business. There are many ways for success.

A single-player version is currently available. You can play with bots of the amount from 1 to 5.

System requirements:

Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 (32 / 64 bit)

Pentium-4 3GHz

RAM 1 GB

HDD 0.2 GB

NVIDIA GeForce GT 710 or AMD Radeon R5 230
